You're the ''THIEF'', since you're here @ TPB, rather a pirate! xD

movies are fine but they are all rar files ..itll take an hour or 2 to unrar them all and put onto disks arrgghhh please no more damn rar files

if you ( everybody ) look at a torrent and it has no screenshots or link to boxcover/official info about the file  google it or use imdb.com or wikipedia and copy and paste links to the info to help everyone else out ! please dont be lazy and expect the uploaders to do everything..do it yourself , the more people stop being selfish & expecting someone else to do this the better off well all be, the piratebay may not be around forever so help out right now !

THANK YOU @zeitgeistmandvdrip 

You go to all the trouble of collecting these movies, and you leave them in RAR format???  What a moron.  And on top of that, half the movies are in 2 CD format.  The days of expensive blank DVDs are gone.  Now I know why the seed count of this torrent is so low.........
what the fuck is wrong with you retards! who cares if it's rar or to cd's or what ever. show some fucking gratitude... fucking no good cunts. tnx, johnnyrep. Nice collection.
Nice Up! I'd hate to have to find and DL these all one by one. Thx.

Thanks Johnny!
Gr8 collection. I was surprised though to see in it Terminator Salvation. I was convinced that it was a computer simulation...
2129 files?!? I never liked RAR files, and now i'm sure i don't like them. Thanks but no thanx. Much easier to find the particular rips you want and just download em.
